description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Common Log File System Driver (CVE-2024-30025), follow these steps:

1. Download the appropriate update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version and architecture:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
   - For other versions, refer to their respective KB articles.
2. Install the update on your system.
3. Restart your computer to ensure the update is applied.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that can lead to elevation of privilege on the affected systems.
- Ensure that your system is one of the supported versions listed (Windows 10 and 11) before applying updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
- Ensure administrative privileges are available to perform the installation.
